mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user VALUES (0, #{name}, #{loginId}, #{pass}, #{email}, CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{phone}) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 4, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 8, 4)) WHEN LENGTH(#{phone}) = 13 THEN #{phone} END , #{gender}, #{age}, #{address}, now(), 1000, false)
mapper.select: SELECT user_phone as phone FROM user where user_phone=CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{phone}) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 4, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 8, 4)) WHEN LENGTH(#{phone}) = 13 THEN #{phone} END

SELECT user_id as id, user_pass as pass, user_loginId as loginId, user_phone as phone, user_address as address, user_age as age, user_gender as gender, user_name as name, user_rate as rate, user_status as status FROM user WHERE user_name LIKE concat('%', #{search}, '%')
